price: 114. Mpe telemisa losambo na ebandeli ya moyi mpe nasúka na ntango moko ya butu. Ya sólo, misala milamu milongolaka miye ya mabe. Wana ezali bokundoli тропа baye bazali kokanisa.
arabic: وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ طَرَفَيِ ٱلنَّهَارِ وَزُلَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡحَسَنَٰتِ يُذۡهِبۡنَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِۚ ذَٰلِكَ ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلذَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqimi al-ṣalata ṭarafayi al-nahāri wazulafan mina al-layli inna al-ḥasanāti yudh'hib'na al-sayiāti dhālika dhik'rā lildhākirīna
